mapper.sql: WATER_NO, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_NAME, REPORT_MODULE, REPORT_SIZE, IS_DELAY, GEN_START_TIME, GEN_END_TIME, USE_TIME, GEN_THREAD, GEN_COUNT, BALANCE_WATER_NO, SYS_LEVEL, REPORT_WATER_NO
mapper.insert: insert into W_RP_LOG_DETAIL (WATER_NO, REPORT_CODE, REPORT_NAME, REPORT_MODULE, REPORT_SIZE, IS_DELAY, GEN_START_TIME, GEN_END_TIME, USE_TIME, GEN_THREAD, GEN_COUNT, BALANCE_WATER_NO, SYS_LEVEL, REPORT_WATER_NO) values (#{waterNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDelay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{genStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{genEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{genThread,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reportWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update W_RP_LOG_DETAIL
REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_NAME = #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_MODULE = #{reportModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_SIZE = #{reportSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELAY = #{isDelay,jdbcType=CHAR},
GEN_START_TIME = #{genStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GEN_END_TIME = #{genEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GEN_THREAD = #{genThread,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GEN_COUNT = #{genCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE_WATER_NO = #{balanceWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_LEVEL = #{sysLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
REPORT_WATER_NO = #{reportWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WATER_NO = #{waterNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update W_RP_LOG_DETAIL set REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_NAME = #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_MODULE = #{reportModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_SIZE = #{reportSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELAY = #{isDelay,jdbcType=CHAR}, GEN_START_TIME = #{genStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GEN_END_TIME = #{genEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GEN_THREAD = #{genThread,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GEN_COUNT = #{genCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BALANCE_WATER_NO = #{balanceWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_LEVEL = #{sysLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, REPORT_WATER_NO = #{reportWaterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WATER_NO = #{waterNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from w_acc_st.W_RP_LOG_DETAIL where 1 = 1
and REPORT_CODE like '%${reportCode}%'
and REPORT_MODULE like '%${reportModule}%'
and BALANCE_WATER_NO like '%${balanceWaterNo}%'
and GEN_START_TIME >= to_date(#{strGenStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd ') and GEN_START_TIME <= to_date(#{strGenEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss ')
and REPORT_SIZE <= #{reportSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
order by GEN_START_TIME desc

select
from w_acc_st.W_RP_LOG_DETAIL where 1 = 1
and REPORT_CODE like '%${reportCode}%'
and REPORT_MODULE like '%${reportModule}%'
and BALANCE_WATER_NO like '%${balanceWaterNo}%'
and GEN_START_TIME >= to_date(#{strGenStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd ')
and REPORT_SIZE <= #{reportSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
order by GEN_START_TIME desc
